author: psmith
msg: Changed the way Receivers and thresholds are displayed/managed
The Threshold of the receiver is displayed via an icon, and
can be modified directly via a popup menu.

author: psmith
msg: When a simple receiver is created, it's threshold is
The rationale here is that otherwise it doesn't have a Level,
and the GUI looks better when one is explicityl defined.

author: psmith
msg: Refactored some code into a separate class for sharing.

author: psmith
msg: Sorting should now work in the majority of cases
now that we're using the native LoggingEvent as the source.

author: psmith
msg: Added NewKeyListener support to the model and the GUI.
Now when a new MDC key arrives via a LoggingEvent into
the table model, a listener ensures that a new Column
is automatically added to the visible Table to ensure it is displayed
